title: Dave's November Shows
name: Dave's November Shows
description:
A Map by Mnapoli

This is a map designed to show how a person building a fan site would use a tool such as platial or googlemaps to chart the shows that dave matthews has played or will play.

Anybody can add shows to this map so people can update it as well as me.

properties.name: Coors Ampitheatre
properties.description: Posted by MnapoliaddressDMB played here on September 28th

properties.name: Cricket Pavilion
properties.description: Posted by MnapoliaddressDMB played here on September 25th

properties.name: Cynthia Woods Mitchell Pavillion
properties.description: Posted by MnapoliaddressDave played here on September 21st

properties.name: Hollywood Bowl
properties.description: Posted by MnapoliHollywoodOctober 1st and 2nd the Dave Matthews Band played a show here.

properties.name: IZOD Center
properties.description: Posted by MnapoliNew JerseyNovember 13th. This was Dave Matthew\'s last stop for their tour. They had their contest show next, but officially this was their show. Held at the IZOD Center.

properties.name: Shoreline Amphitheatre
properties.description: Posted by Mnapoli1 Amphitheatre Pkwy, Mountain View, CADave had a show here on September 29th

properties.name: West Point, Military Academy
properties.description: Posted by MnapoliaddressNovember 14th and 15th. Dave Matthews played a free concert for the university that won the pep rally contest. The University was the West Point United States Military Academy
